content: Audition Tips

tag: html body div div h2 span
content: How To Audition

tag: html body div div h4 span
content: Step 1: Create an Artist Account

tag: html body div div p a span
content: Sign Up HERE at nbcthevoice.com to create your Artist Account.

tag: html body div div p span
content: You will receive an Artist Account number and once you've confirmed your e-mail address, you'll be able to customize your Artist Profile and register for an audition city.

tag: html body div div h4 span
content: Step 2: Choose An Audition City

tag: html body div div p span
content: Once you've created your Artist Account, you must select the city you'd like to attend for the Open Call Audition.

tag: html body div div p span
content: You will be able to select a city, date, and time group of your choice. Only come to the audition on the day & time you've registered for.

tag: html body div div h4 span
content: Step 3: Print Your Artist Audition Pass

tag: html body div div p span
content: ONE WEEK before your audition day, you will receive your personal Artist Audition Pass. It will be e-mailed to you. You will also be able to download your pass by logging into your Artist Account.

tag: html body div div p span
content: You MUST PRINT and BRING your Artist Audition Pass along with a photo ID in order to audition.

tag: html body div div h4 span
content: Step 4: Auditions

tag: html body div div p span
content: Your selected city, date, time & location will be printed on your Artist Audition Pass.

tag: html body div div p span
content: Only attend your selected audition day and time.

tag: html body div div p span
content: DO NOT FORGET: Your printed Artist Audition Pass and your Photo ID.

tag: html body div div h2 span
content: Open Call Guidelines

tag: html body div div p span
content: Please prepare two (2) songs for your open call audition. You will be required to perform one song, but have the second song ready if asked.

tag: html body div div p span
content: A CAPPELLA ONLY at the open call auditions.

tag: html body div div p span
content: NO background tracks, NO accompaniment, NO instruments.

tag: html body div div p span
content: The only thing we want to hear is YOUR VOICE. To be clear, you CANNOT play your guitar at the Open Call Audition.

tag: html body div div p span
content: Songs can be by any artist and from any genre (pop, rock, R&B, hip-hop, alternative, latin, country, blues, indie).

tag: html body div div p span
content: Pick songs that fit your voice and best represent the artist you are.

tag: html body div div p span
content: Family, friends, managers, vocal instructors, etc. will NOT be allowed at the audition.

tag: html body div div p span
content: If you are under 18 or are otherwise a minor in your home state, one (1) parent or guardian will be allowed with you at the audition.

tag: html body div div p span
content: If you require special accommodations due to a disability or other need, please contact our casting team prior to your audition.

tag: html body div div p span
content: Come dressed in a style that represents you as an artist. Do NOT come in "chicken costumes." We are looking for serious artists ONLY.

tag: html body div div p span
content: Please plan to be at the audition all day. We suggest bringing snacks and water. Please check the weather in your audition city and plan accordingly as some audition venues have outside waiting areas.

tag: html body div div p span
content: The coaches will NOT be at the open call auditions.

tag: html body div div p span
content: You may be asked to stay for a call back please plan accordingly.

tag: html body div div h2 span
content: Callback Audition Guidelines

tag: html body div div p span
content: (This is ONLY if you get a Red Card at the Open Call)

tag: html body div div p span
content: You may be asked to a callback. If you are selected, you will be scheduled a time & date to return. Here are the guidelines for the callback audition.

tag: html body div div p span
content: NOTE: This is ONLY for artists that audition at the open call and are given a callback.

tag: html body div div p span
content: You must prepare three (3) current/popular songs for the callback. You may be asked to perform a song of the producer's choice.

tag: html body div div p span
content: NO original music.

tag: html body div div p span
content: You may sing to a backing track, play an instrument, have one (1) person accompany you. A cappella is NOT allowed at the CALLBACKS; you must have accompaniment.

tag: html body div div p span
content: If you play an instrument while you sing, you must perform at least one (1) song without.

tag: html body div div p span
content: The coaches will NOT be at the callback auditions.
